SEARCH
Package mediator

Interface GameSpaceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameSpace
public interface GameSpaceInterface
Interface for a game space that acts as a mediator for cells. Defines methods for adding cells, handling state change requests, and printing cell states.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCell(Cell cell)
    Adds a cell to the game space.
    void
    printCells()
    Prints the current states of all cells in the game space.
    void
    requestStateChange(CellInterface cell, String newState)
    Requests a state change for a specific cell.

  • Method Details

    • addCell

      void addCell(Cell cell)
      Adds a cell to the game space.
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell to add.

    • requestStateChange

      void requestStateChange(CellInterface cell, String newState)
      Requests a state change for a specific cell.
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell for which the state change is requested.
      newState - the new state to set.

    • printCells

      void printCells()
      Prints the current states of all cells in the game space.
